item.title: Melissa add a quote by Patricia C. Wrede
item.description:
"Well,” said the frog, “what are you going to do about it?”
“Marrying Therandil? I don’t know. I’ve tried talking to my parents, but they won’t listen, and neither will Therandil.”
“I didn’t ask what you’d said about it,” the frog snapped. “I asked what you’re going to do. Nine times out of ten, talking is a way of avoiding doing things." -- Patricia C. Wrede

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Avi
item.description: "A sailor chooses the wind that takes the ship from a safe port. Ah, yes, but once you're abroad, as you have seen, winds have a mind of their own. Be careful, Charlotte, careful of the wind you choose." -- Avi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Avi
item.description: "It all depends on you. If you want it to be different,it will be different. Don't look at the world with your eyes but with your heart." -- Avi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Avi
item.description: "The cure for unhappiness...It's this: What a person needs is always more than they say." -- Avi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Avi
item.description: "There are those who'd rob a blind man of his eyelashes if they could." -- Avi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Avi
item.description: "A mouse has to do what a mouse has to do" -- Avi
